description.black-white:
While resisting, the user attacks the
opposing Pokémon. The targets’
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
description.black-2-white-2:
While resisting, the user attacks the
opposing Pokémon. The targets’
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
description.x-y:
While resisting, the user attacks the
opposing Pokémon. This lowers the
Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
